title: Building a RAG Knowledge Base
description: Learn how to build and manage a RAG knowledge base with Plugged.in for enhanced AI interactions

overview.title: Overview
overview.introduction: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) allows you to enhance AI interactions by providing relevant context from your documents. Plugged.in's document library enables you to build a project-specific knowledge base.
